actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadow goblin can make two attacks with its kitchen knife. The second attack has disadvantage.

actions.name: Kitchen Knife
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The shadow goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The shadow goblin has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in dim light or darkness.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the shadow goblin has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Traveler in Darkness
special_abilities.desc: The shadow goblin has advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks made to know about shadow roads and shadow magic spells or items.

special_abilities.name: Unseelie Blessing
special_abilities.desc: The shadow goblin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.
